Destiny Church youth group leader stood down, police investigation under way into allegations of sexual abuse https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/destiny-church-youth-group-leader-stood-down-police-investigation-under-way-into-allegations-of- Sex-abuse/TC46HOWEIJEE3PQXLQ5TOCSL2Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/destiny-church-youth-group-leader-stood-down-police-investigation-under-way-into-allegations-of- Sex-abuse/TC46HOWEIJEE3PQXLQ5TOCSL2Y/ Lane NicholsPolice have launched an investigation into the 'historical sexual assault allegations'. Newmarket pool incident: Two men found ‘motionless’ after holding breath under water https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/newmarket-pool-incident-two-men-found-motionless-after-deliberately-holding-breath/MN5YM6UVABETPKH5NSGB7LO4AA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/newmarket-pool-incident-two-men-found-motionless-after-deliberately-holding-breath/MN5YM6UVABETPKH5NSGB7LO4AA/ Rachel MaherThe pair were resuscitated poolside before being taken to hospital. Sun, 26 May 2024 08:35:47 +0000 Two men were critically injured yesterday evening at the Olympic Pool in Newmarket, Auckland. Photo / Jason Dorday
Tinder swindler: Kiwi divorcee loses $580k in 14-month romance scam after falling in love with US oil rig worker https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tinder-swindler-divorced-kiwi-woman-loses-580k-in-14-month-romance-scam-after-falling-in-love-with-us-石油钻井工人/PADSZFF4KBAONHQXDQBG5RRRJU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tinder-swindler-divorced-kiwi-woman-loses-580k-in-14-month-romance-scam-after-falling-in-love-with-us-石油钻井工人/PADSZFF4KBAONHQXDQBG5RRRJU/ Lane NicholsThe victim was sent log in details to a fake UK bank account showing a balance of $3m. Sun, 26 May 2024 08:02:35 +0000 The scammer claimed he was a petroleum engineer named Scott Thomas working on an oil rig off the Canadian coast. However, the victim's family now believe the photos he sent and elaborate back story were all fake.

Taranaki amputee Ed Dormon says life forever changed by crash that took his leg https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/taranaki-amputee-ed-dormon-says-life-forever-changed-by-crash-that-took-his-leg/SQH2TKN75RDG5JU4XRUPF5S6DI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/taranaki-amputee-ed-dormon-says-life-forever-changed-by-crash-that-took-his-leg/SQH2TKN75RDG5JU4XRUPF5S6DI/ Melissa NightingaleEd Dormon's first thought was about being able to continue his passion of caregiving.
